alert.note: Alert for Codington; Deuel; Grant (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 12:31PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Deuel, southwestern Grant and northeastern Codington Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 131 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 6 miles north of Dakota Sioux Casino to near Waverly to Goodwin. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 30 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Waverly around 135 PM CDT. School Lake around 145 PM CDT. Troy and Bullhead Lake around 150 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include South Shore, Stockholm and Strandburg. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
